what: Render a bunch of small .tex files — render_tex_files
title: Render a bunch of small .tex files — render_tex_files
text: Use case: bunch stuff done LaTeXiT, resulting helper calculations derivations contained tex files. rendered PDF using tex_fun, per default tinytex::xelatex, optionally converted png using system convert tool via imagemagick.

title: Render a bunch of small .tex files — render_tex_files
code: render_tex_files(   path,   cleanup = TRUE,   tex_fun = tinytex::xelatex,   to_png = TRUE )

title: Render a bunch of small .tex files — render_tex_files
text: path Folder .tex files . cleanup TRUE: Whether cleanup auxilliary files (e.g. .aux, .log, ...) tex_fun function use, default ist tinytex::xelatex. to_png TRUE: Whether use convert convert PDF png.

Tidy eval helpers — tidyeval
text: sym() creates symbol string syms() creates list symbols character vector. enquo() enquos() delay execution one several function arguments. enquo() returns single quoted expression, like blueprint delayed computation. enquos() returns list quoted expressions. expr() quotes new expression locally. mostly useful build new expressions around arguments captured enquo() enquos(): expr(mean(!!enquo(arg), na.rm = TRUE)). as_name() transforms quoted variable name string. Supplying something else quoted variable name error. unlike as_label() also returns single string supports kind R object input, including quoted function calls vectors. purpose summarise object single label. label often suitable default name. know quoted expression contains (instance expressions captured enquo() variable name, call function, unquoted constant), use as_label(). know quoted simple variable name, like enforce , use as_name(). learn tidy eval use tools, visit https://tidyeval.tidyverse.org Metaprogramming section Advanced R.

jemisc 0.0.4.9000
text: Remove blogdown helper Remove magrittr import re-export

title: jemisc 0.0.3
text: Switch GitHub actions travis weird pkgdown deployment. Add simple coolors.co URL parser extract RGB colors vector.

title: jemisc 0.0.2
text: Remove Rmd template put {jermd}. Add new_post() function + RStudio addin use blogdown. version adds additional taxonomie “packages” “shows”.

title: jemisc 0.0.1
text: Add sr_d6 dicerolls Add tidy_xtab xtabs . Added TeX-helpers. Added custom rmarkdown PDF template. Added functions check available installed RStudio dev versions. Added functions cite packages easily. Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
